    public class Circle
extends Ring

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle(java.awt.Color c,
      double originX,
      double originY,
      double radiusP)
       throws SVGFormatException
        This is the default constructor for Circle, which is a type of Ring that have a inner radius of zero. It takes parameter of its color, origins and shape specific area.
        Parameters:
        c - The Color of the shape.
        originX - Origin X relative to the pixmap width
        originY - Origin Y relative to the pixmap height
        radiusP - The radius of the circle relative to the pixmap width
        Throws:
        SVGFormatException - if given size is negative
